function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited representation of interdisciplinary knowledge may restrict the applicability of biophilic design to address contagious disease propagation in the built environment.","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited research on the impact of nature-based design in architecture","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Literal greening used as a marketing tool may create false expectations and limited impact on social, economic, and environmental challenges.","category":"Lower investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate funding for scientific research during pandemics","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost and unavailability of airpop masks for android users","category":"Discontinuity of services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of additive manufacturing technologies using fff, up to a certain production volume, may lead to limited availability of ppe.","category":"Global recession and economic instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the integrated effects of solutions, such as whether different interventions are additive, multiplicative, or contradictory in their outcomes.","category":"Construction industry impacts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient investigation of the cost-effectiveness of various interventions and combinations, including ongoing maintenance costs, energy consumption, and impacts on the fm budget.","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of touchless operation technology for common office items and facilities","category":"Workforce and labor shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Displacement ventilation promotes vertical stratification and higher ventilation effectiveness but may have mixed cost-effectiveness.","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Adverse outcomes of increasing ventilation rate, including indoor discomfort, higher energy consumption, and increased co2 emissions","category":"Food supply chain disruptions ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of economic, environmental, and social outcomes of interventions related to indoor air quality iaq control in buildings","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain and unexpected outcomes","category":"Pandemic investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel-related risks for vulnerable communities due to lack of job opportunities near neighborhoods and insufficient support for active risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misrepresentation of human activity due to the use of simple aggregation measures based on zip code boundaries.","category":"Workforce and labor
